solution_line_template: There are {initial_slices}-{friend_eats}=<<{initial_slices}-{friend_eats}={slices_left_after_friend}>>{slices_left_after_friend} slices left after his friend eats some slices
That means So he eats {slices_left_after_friend}/{james_eats_divisor}=<<{slices_left_after_friend}/{james_eats_divisor}={james_eats_slices}>>{james_eats_slices} slices
